long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: EcoTrack Chrome Extension empowers users to make sustainable choices directly from their browser. By integrating with the EcoTrack Service and leveraging the powerful Gemini 1.5 Pro AI model, this extension provides real-time insights into product carbon footprints, recycling options, and sustainability tips. With a sleek React-based interface and seamless backend integration, EcoTrack delivers critical environmental information right at your fingertips, helping you make informed, eco-friendly purchasing decisions effortlessly.
